title: How to Fold a Cup from a Sheet of Paper

steps.title: Fold a perfectly square piece of paper diagonally.
steps.content: Fold a perfectly square piece of paper diagonally. When you're done, it'll be in the shape of a triangle.

steps.title: Fold one corner to the center of the opposite side.
steps.content: Fold one corner to the center of the opposite side. Be sure to choose one of the two identical corners, not the third corner that's a perfect 90-degree angle.

steps.title: Repeat with the other corner.
steps.content: Repeat with the other corner. The tops of the two folds will perfectly overlap when you're done.

steps.title: Fold the top flaps down to create an opening in your paper cup.Tuck each flap in the previous folds.
steps.content: Fold the top flaps down to create an opening in your paper cup.Tuck each flap in the previous folds.
